It doesn't seem to erase memories, and so the very moment Albedo is free she would kill him brutally and horribly as punishment for making her betray Ainz. He wouldn't have a chance to get near the throne, as any sort of cell would be far from the throne room and anyone past the second floor of Nazarick could kill him before he had the chance to even pick up one of those things. Besides, don't those total maniac devices belong in the treasury? The only logical explanation is that Pandora's Actor posed as the prisoner and used the Ring of Ainz Ooal Gown to teleport out of the treasury. Even then, that would only make sense if Ainz ordered him to, in order to satisfy Albedo, but in that case he wouldn't go through the trouble of being indirect or manipulating her to make her question her loyalty and feel shame. Still better than a flesh cock though

@dje956153: Not sure about the anime, but in the novel, Ainz does love them. He sees them as the children of his friends.  He even breaks down at one point when he thinks he lost one of them. So he wouldn't be mad that they hid it from him, but furious at what the man did.  But your right that his undead self will suppress that, yet it doesn't change that he still felt that anger, and what he'd do to the man who did that to them. He'll just calmly be able to think of a way to kill that guy. Oh yea, he has feelings, they're just suppressed when they pass a certain point.

Lel maybe I am just being silly, but the plot + logic in this one kinda rubbed me of. I mean Zack = dead, Albedo is supposedly able to move and rip of Zack's head before he can even react, instead of slowly creeping up and letting him turn around and use the magic item but I know hentai logic. But the two most glaring points are one, he finds a box with what looks to include 20ish of the magic items, but supposedly he uses hundreds if not thousands of them. Since each use only lasts an hour and he uses multiple of them per day + hard to make them pregnant + their about to give birth = thousands of the magic item, and of course the last point that a) he is seen having sex with them but no one reports it to anyone else and b) no one notices the huge bellies of the two.

But yeah maybe I am just being silly seeing as it's a hentai but still.
